definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: The cuneiform script is a great invention by the Sumerians.
sentences.chinese: 楔形文字是苏美尔人的一大发明。

sentences.english: Its Assyrian collections formed the basis for the understanding of cuneiform (an ancient Middle Eastern script).
sentences.chinese: 它的亚述集合构成了对楔形文字理解的基础上。

sentences.english: Persian culture by the cultural impact of Mesopotamia, the use of cuneiform.
sentences.chinese: 波斯文化受两河流域文化影响，使用楔形文字。

sentences.english: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.chinese: 她用楔形文字写下了献给神祇的颂歌。

sentences.english: With the cultural dissemination, other ethnic groups in west Asia and southwest Asia adopted cuneiform .
sentences.chinese: 楔形文字传播的地区主要在西亚和西南亚。

definition: Sumer (Šumer), one of the early civilizations of the Ancient Near East

pinyin: Mei3 suo3 bu4 da2 mi3 ya4

definition: oracle script/oracle bone character (an early form of Chinese script)
Coptic, Afro-Asiatic language of the Copts 科普特人[Ke1 pu3 te4 ren2], spoken in Egypt until late 17th century
tortoise shell and animal bones used in divination/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)
